Localization.Name: F8C Lightning 2954 Ship Showdown Poster
Localization.Description: Congratulations to the F8C Lightning for winning the 2954 Ship Showdown. This poster honors the Lightning, a ship that has protected Humanity countless times from countless threats at home and far from civilization.
